mapper.select: select deal_no, contents, rating, reg_date from review where deal_no = #{ dealNo }
select r.deal_no, contents, rating, r.reg_date, d.buyer from review r INNER JOIN deal d on d.deal_no = r.deal_no where d.product_no = ${productNo}
select r.deal_no, r.contents, rating, r.reg_date, d.buyer, d.product_no from review r INNER JOIN deal d on d.deal_no = r.deal_no where d.buyer = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from reviewfile where review_file_no = #{ reviewFileNo }
mapper.select: select r.deal_no, r.contents, r.reg_date, r.rating, d.buyer, d.product_no, p.name from review r, deal d, product p where r.deal_no = d.deal_no and d.product_no = p.product_no and p.seller = #{id} order by r.reg_date desc
select coalesce(avg(r.rating), 0.0) as staravg from review r, deal d, product p where r.deal_no = d.deal_no and d.product_no = p.product_no and p.seller = #{id};
